top_performing_examples.example: Before and after transformation posts showing dramatic grooming results, particularly for matted or neglected dogs. These posts typically show side-by-side images with captions describing the dog's condition and the grooming process.
top_performing_examples.why_it_worked: Visual transformation content triggers emotional responses and demonstrates expertise. Pet owners relate to the before state and aspire to the after state. The dramatic visual contrast drives high engagement and shares.
top_performing_examples.metrics: Top grooming transformation posts regularly achieve 3-5x higher engagement than standard posts, with some viral examples reaching 50K+ likes and 1K+ shares

top_performing_examples.example: Educational video content showing common grooming mistakes pet owners make at home, particularly around matting prevention, brushing techniques, and nail trimming safety. Short-form video (15-60 seconds) performs best.

top_performing_examples.metrics: UGC campaigns typically generate 4-6x more engagement than brand-created content and increase booking inquiries by 20-30% during campaign periods

top_performing_examples.metrics: Behind-the-scenes content drives 35-40% higher save rates and generates more direct messages with booking inquiries compared to finished product photos
